resources.string: Fingerprint authentication is not supported in this device.
No fingerprint registered in this device. Register fingerprints first.
This app uses the autofill framework to autofill your apps with credentials. Currently, this service is not enabled. Please enable in settings.
Set a credential for this package. Alternatively, you can also generate a strong password by tapping Generate.
Below is the currently saved credential. Tap copy to save the password to the clipboard.
Set a credential for a new site. Alternatively, you can also generate a strong password by tapping Generate.
Password has been copied to clipboard

Important Notice!\n\nBackup requires you to connect to the application server and publish your details. All details published will be encrypted using your registered key. This app does not in any way save your keys so there\'s no way to retrieve your data in case you forgot about your key. If you are not comfortable in publishing your encrypted details, please backup manually.
Backup all saved credentials to the cloud
Pull all saved credentials from the cloud
Delete all uploaded credentials and key
This one time key cannot be modified and will not be recoverable from this application. Please backup this key to be able to restore data from the cloud.
Warning. Backing up will delete all previous cloud data and will be replaced with the currently stored data. Proceed with caution.
Backup ongoing. Please do not close the application or press any button. This dialog will automatically close once backup is finished.
Warning. Restoring will delete all local data and will be replaced with remote data. Proceed with caution.
Restoration ongoing. Please do not close the application or press any button. This dialog will automatically close once restoration is finished.
